item.title: Yadgir, Raichur see smooth, fair and transparent conduct of SSLC examinations
item.description:
<![CDATA[The examinations for SSLC went on in a smooth, fair and transparent manner on the first day on Friday. The first paper was the language one consisting of Kannada, English and Urdu.
“The examinations were very peaceful. All arrangements had already been made for the students to appear,“ C.S. Mudhol, Deputy Director of Public Instruction, told The Hindu.
As many as 16,683 students were eligible to write the examinations and of them, 16,081 students appeared and 602 remained absent.
Of the total...]]>
